badges.name: Boulder Badge
badges.description: It is a simple gray octagon.

badges.name: Cascade Badge
badges.description: It is in the shape of a light blue raindrop.

badges.name: Thunder Badge
badges.description: It is in the shape of an eight-pointed gold star with an orange octagon in the center.

badges.name: Rainbow Badge
badges.description: It is shaped like a flower, showing grass, with rainbow colored petals.

badges.name: Soul Badge
badges.description: It is in the shape of a fuchsia heart.

badges.name: Marsh Badge
badges.description: It is two concentric golden circles.

badges.name: Volcano Badge
badges.description: It is red and shaped like a flame with a small pink diamond in the center.

badges.name: Earth Badge
badges.description: It is shaped like a plant, most likely a Sakaki tree, which is where Giovanni's Japanese name comes from.
